title: Netflix blames password sharing as one of the main reasons behind its subscriber loss
content:
Netflix reported a decline in subscribers for the first time in more than ten years. The company lost about 200,000 users in Q1 2022 compared to Q4 2021 and said the forecast is even bleaker for the second quarter.
